appDesc.message: Using image downloader, locate and download all of the images on a website.

donotshowdialogagain.message: Do not show this dialog again

foundLabel.translation_note: leave the '%n', it will be replaces with the number of images found, ie 'Found 22 images'

heightLabel.translation_note: the height is intended as the pixel 'height' of the image

makesurechrome.message: Make sure you don't have selected the 'Ask where to save each file before downloading' checkbox in

makesurefirefox.message: Make sure you don't have selected the 'Always ask where to save files' checkbox in Firefox Settings --> Files and Applications section.

manyfilesnum.translation_note: leave the '%n', it will be replaces with the number of download images , ie 'Download 22 images'

otherwisechrome.message: Otherwise Edge by design will popup the Save as... dialog for each file :-(

otherwisefirefox.message: Otherwise Firefox by design will popup the Save as... dialog for each file :-(

widthLabel.translation_note: the width is intended as the pixel 'width' of the image

isImgPreview.message: Do you want to enable the image preview function
